sentences.sContent: That had an interesting and extremely useful side effect.
sentences.sContent_eng: That had an interesting and extremely useful side effect.
sentences.sCn: 那有一个有趣和非常有用的负作用。

sentences.sContent: Yet another side effect is that I seem to think much better when I eat this way.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet another side effect is that I seem to think much better when I eat this way.
sentences.sCn: 而且，还有第三种作用，那就是我的思考能力通过这种饮食法大大提高了。

sentences.sContent: As a side effect of all this, you can use a stylesheet that doesn't do anything to a document, and simply take one format as input and output that document to any other format.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a side effect of all this, you can use a stylesheet that doesn't do anything to a document, and simply take one format as input and output that document to any other format.
sentences.sCn: 这种方法的另外一个作用是，您可以使用一个不含任何文档操作的样式表，并使用某种格式作为输入，然后将这种格式输出为任意其他的格式。

trans.tranOther: an effect that a drug has on your body in addition to curing pain or illness
